sentence: Are you ready for the English test tomorrow?
你准备好明天的英语考试了吗？
Please take out your English textbook and turn to page 20.
请拿出你的英语课本，翻到第20页。
I can't find my eraser. Can I borrow yours?
我找不到我的橡皮了，我能借你的吗？
Life in junior high school is more interesting than in primary school.
初中的生活比小学更有趣。
We learn about different countries and rivers in geography class.
我们在地理课上学习不同的国家和河流。
In biology, we studied how plants grow from small seeds.
在生物课上，我们学习了植物如何从小种子生长。
The history teacher told us a story about ancient China.
历史老师给我们讲了一个关于古代中国的故事。
My father bought a new grey jacket last week.
我爸爸上周买了一件新的灰色夹克。
It's cold outside, so remember to wear your jacket.
外面很冷，记得穿上你的夹克。
All the students wear a red scarf at the school ceremony.
所有学生在学校典礼上都佩戴红领巾。
I like to wear a blue T-shirt with my jeans on weekends.
周末我喜欢穿蓝色T恤配牛仔裤。
Nurses and police officers often wear a uniform for work.
护士和警察工作时经常穿制服。
We must wear our school uniform from Monday to Friday.
我们从周一到周五必须穿校服。
"Can you help me with my homework?" "Of course, I can."
"你能帮我做作业吗？" "当然可以。"
Don't forget to bring your sports shoes for P.E. class tomorrow.
别忘了明天体育课带你的运动鞋。
Our classroom is on the third floor of the teaching building.
我们的教室在教学楼的三楼。
We have lunch together with our friends in the school dining hall.
我们在学校食堂和朋友一起吃午饭。
My classmates and I often study together in the library.
我和我的同学们经常在图书馆一起学习。
We did an interesting experiment in the science lab yesterday.
我们昨天在科学实验室做了一个有趣的实验。
The first lesson starts at eight o'clock every morning.
第一节课每天早上八点开始。
We should help each other when we have difficulties.
我们有困难时应该互相帮助。
The teacher asked everyone to write their name on the paper.
老师让每个人把名字写在纸上。
We will explore the history museum next week for a school trip.
下周学校旅行我们将去探索历史博物馆。
Playing basketball after school is a lot of fun.
放学后打篮球很有趣。
On the first day, the teacher asked us to introduce ourselves.
第一天，老师让我们做自我介绍。
Please tell the class about yourself, like your name and hobby.
请告诉全班关于你自己的情况，比如你的名字和爱好。
My hobby is collecting stamps from different countries.
我的爱好是收集不同国家的邮票。
I feel a bit nervous before giving a speech in front of the class.
在班级面前演讲前我感到有点紧张。
She always feels nervous when she takes an important exam.
她参加重要考试时总是感到紧张。
I want to join the school basketball team this term.
这学期我想加入学校篮球队。
Our school football team won the match last Saturday.
我们学校足球队上周六赢了比赛。
Many students will take part in the school sports day.
许多学生将参加学校运动会。
You cannot pass the exam without hard work.
不努力你就无法通过考试。
Please write a sentence using the new word we learned today.
请用我们今天学的新词写一个句子。
The teacher will point out our mistakes in the homework.
老师会指出我们作业中的错误。
I made a spelling mistake in my English composition.
我在英语作文里犯了一个拼写错误。
It is polite to say "thank you" when someone helps you.
当别人帮助你时说"谢谢"是有礼貌的。
Would you mind closing the window? It's a little cold.
你介意关一下窗户吗？有点冷。
This red scarf is not mine. I think it is hers.
这条红领巾不是我的，我想是她的。
We hung our wet clothes outside to let them become dry.
我们把湿衣服挂在外面让它们变干。
Can you tell me the meaning of this difficult word?
你能告诉我这个难词的意思吗？
It is a fact that the sun rises in the east.
太阳从东边升起是一个事实。
I thought the movie was boring. In fact, it was very exciting.
我以为这电影很无聊。事实上，它非常刺激。
You need to finish your homework before you watch TV.
你需要先完成作业再看电视。
I always remember to bring my umbrella on rainy days.
下雨天我总是记得带伞。
I really enjoy reading books in the school library.
我非常喜欢在学校图书馆看书。
It is important to have a good breakfast before school.
上学前吃一顿好的早餐很重要。
We plan to visit our grandparents during the summer holiday.
我们计划暑假期间去看望祖父母。
If you have any problem with your study, please ask the teacher.
如果你学习上有任何问题，请问老师。
I spent one hour doing my maths homework yesterday evening.
我昨天晚上花了一个小时做数学作业。
Our group task is to make a poster about environmental protection.
我们小组的任务是做一张关于环境保护的海报。
For the science project, we grew some beans in a small pot.
对于科学项目，我们在一个小花盆里种了一些豆子。
My teacher gave me some good advice on how to learn English well.
我的老师给了我一些关于如何学好英语的好建议。
The bus journey from my home to school takes about twenty minutes.
从我家到学校的公交车旅程大约需要二十分钟。
I want to tell you something interesting about my new friend.
我想告诉你一些关于我新朋友的有趣的事。
After much thought, I decided to join the art club.
经过深思熟虑，我决定加入美术俱乐部。
School life becomes busier but more fun in junior high.
初中学校生活变得更忙但也更有趣。
I made many good friends during my time in primary school.
我在小学期间交了很多好朋友。
In summer, we often go swimming in the swimming pool near my home.
夏天，我们经常去我家附近的游泳池游泳。
We should protect wild animals and not hurt them.
我们应该保护野生动物，不伤害它们。
The strong wind blew my hat off when I was walking home.
我走路回家时，大风把我的帽子吹走了。
The river near our town is very wide and deep.
我们镇附近的那条河又宽又深。
They plan to sail across the lake in a small boat this weekend.
他们计划这周末乘一艘小船横渡湖泊。
We walked through the forest and saw many beautiful birds.
我们步行穿过了森林，看到了许多美丽的鸟。
We stayed at home because of the heavy rain and strong storm.
因为大雨和强烈的风暴，我们待在家里。
She ran towards her mother when she saw her at the school gate.
她在校门口看到妈妈时，朝妈妈跑了过去。
I hope I can get good marks in the final exam.
我希望我能在期末考试中取得好成绩。
My brother enjoys listening to rock music very much.
我哥哥非常喜欢听摇滚音乐。
My father uses an electric shaver every morning.
我爸爸每天早上使用电动剃须刀。
He is learning to play the guitar at a music club.
他正在一个音乐俱乐部学习弹吉他。
The school band will play at the opening of the sports day.
学校乐队将在运动会开幕式上演奏。
The sound of the school bell tells us it is time for class.
学校铃声告诉我们上课时间到了。
Students from different countries join our summer camp.
来自不同国家的学生参加我们的夏令营。
It started to rain suddenly when we were playing football.
我们踢足球时，天突然开始下雨了。
Be careful not to hit the ball too hard, or it will fly away.
小心别把球打得太重，否则它会飞走的。
We often rush to the dining hall when the lunch bell rings.
午餐铃响时，我们常常冲向食堂。
The Spring Festival is the most important festival in China.
春节是中国最重要的节日。
I can't decide which book to borrow from the library.
我无法决定从图书馆借哪本书。
You need more practice if you want to speak English well.
如果你想英语说得好，你需要更多的练习。
She felt very happy when she stood on the stage and sang a song.
当她站在舞台上唱歌时，她感到非常快乐。
The teacher nodded to show that my answer was correct.
老师点了点头，表明我的答案是正确的。
The piano is a difficult but beautiful musical instrument to learn.
钢琴是一种难学但优美的乐器。
Everybody in our class likes our new English teacher.
我们班每个人都喜欢我们的新英语老师。
She always has a warm smile on her face when she helps others.
她帮助别人时脸上总是带着温暖的微笑。
I really enjoy playing volleyball with my friends after school.
我非常喜欢放学后和朋友打排球。
In winter, children like to skate on the ice in the park.
冬天，孩子们喜欢在公园的冰上滑冰。
I am a member of the school reading club.
我是学校阅读俱乐部的成员。
We have a volleyball match against Class Two next Monday.
我们下周一和二班有一场排球比赛。
We eat traditional food like dumplings during the Spring Festival.
我们在春节期间吃饺子之类的传统食物。
My grandma is very good at the art of paper-cutting.
我奶奶非常擅长剪纸艺术。
Please hold my bag for a moment while I tie my shoes.
我系鞋带时，请帮我拿一下包。
Don't throw rubbish on the ground. Put it in the bin.
不要把垃圾扔在地上，放进垃圾桶里。
I was weak in maths, but now I am improving with more practice.
我过去数学很弱，但现在通过更多练习我正在进步。
The new teaching building is very high with ten floors.
新的教学楼有十层，非常高。
We should love and protect the beauty of nature.
我们应该热爱和保护大自然的美。
Reading a book about space is like going on a great adventure.
读一本关于太空的书就像进行一次伟大的冒险。
I was still awake at midnight because I was too excited.
午夜时我还醒着，因为我太兴奋了。
The story was so interesting that I read it until midnight.
这个故事太有趣了，我一直读到午夜。
The sun begins to appear in the east early in the morning.
清晨，太阳开始从东方出现。
My heart beats fast when I run in the PE class.
我在体育课上跑步时心跳得很快。
I almost finished my homework when my friend called me.
我朋友给我打电话时，我几乎快做完作业了。
Don't forget to turn off the tap after you wash your hands.
洗完手后别忘了关水龙头。
You should shake the bottle before you drink the medicine.
你喝药前应该摇一摇瓶子。
My deskmate is also my best classmate and friend.
我的同桌也是我最好的同学和朋友。
She felt a little lonely when she first came to this new school.
她刚来到这所新学校时感到有点孤独。
The children watched a magic show at the school party.
孩子们在学校聚会上看了一场魔术表演。
Reading brings me great joy and knowledge.
阅读带给我巨大的快乐和知识。
I write down new English words in my notebook every day.
我每天在笔记本上记下新的英语单词。
Please put the book back on the shelf after you read it.
请你看完书后把它放回书架上。
I usually leave home for school at seven o'clock in the morning.
我通常早上七点离家去学校。
Please turn to page fifty and read the text aloud.
请翻到第五十页，大声朗读课文。
The ending of the story was very happy and made me smile.
这个故事的结局非常快乐，让我笑了。
The library is a silent place for reading and studying.
图书馆是一个供阅读和学习的安静场所。
We walked along the river and enjoyed the beautiful view.
我们沿着河走，欣赏美丽的景色。
Last summer, we climbed a high mountain with my family.
去年夏天，我们全家爬了一座高山。
Be careful when you cross the road. Look left and right first.
过马路时要小心。先左右看看。
Many people think my elder brother is a handsome boy.
许多人认为我哥哥是个帅气的男孩。
Our maths teacher is strict but very kind to us.
我们的数学老师很严格，但对我们很好。
Please follow me, and I will show you to your new classroom.
请跟我来，我带你去你的新教室。
The postman delivers letters and newspapers to our house every day.
邮递员每天给我们家送信和报纸。
The movie about a mother's love was very touching.
那部关于母爱的电影非常感人。
Mr. Li is very proud of his son, who studies very hard.
李先生为他的儿子感到非常自豪，他学习非常努力。
We should learn to serve our community and help others.
我们应该学习服务社区、帮助他人。
There is a big playground in the school sports area.
学校运动区有一个大操场。
He was absent from school yesterday because he had a bad cold.
他昨天缺课了，因为他得了重感冒。
My father is very busy, so he seldom watches TV.
我爸爸很忙，所以他很少看电视。
The teacher changed my position to the front of the classroom.
老师把我的座位调到了教室前面。
Let me help you carry these heavy books to the teacher's office.
让我帮你把这些沉重的书搬到教师办公室。
There is a small bridge across the river behind our school.
我们学校后面的河上有一座小桥。
I have a good memory of my first day at junior high school.
我对初中第一天有着美好的记忆。
A tear fell from her eye when she heard the sad news.
当她听到这个悲伤的消息时，一滴眼泪从她眼中落下。
Water and sunlight are important for the growth of plants.
水和阳光对植物的生长很重要。
The little cat likes to hide under the bed when it sees strangers.
那只小猫看到陌生人时喜欢躲在床底下。
We should care for our parents and help them with housework.
我们应该关心父母，帮他们做家务。
She gave her mother a warm hug when she came back from a trip.
她旅行回来时给了妈妈一个温暖的拥抱。
The mother kissed her baby goodnight before he went to sleep.
妈妈在宝宝睡觉前亲吻他道晚安。
My aunt will marry a kind man next month.
我阿姨下个月要嫁给一个善良的人。
The queen in the story was very beautiful and wise.
故事里的王后非常美丽和聪明。
Please pick up the piece of paper you dropped on the floor.
请把你掉在地上的那张纸捡起来。
She wants to be a famous actress when she grows up.
她长大后想成为一名著名的女演员。
The weather changes quickly in spring. It can be sunny and then rainy.
春天天气变化很快。可能晴天然后下雨。
I will take part in the 100-metre race at the school sports day.
我将在学校运动会上参加100米赛跑。
We must be serious when the teacher is explaining important points.
老师讲解重点时我们必须认真。
Doctors work hard to find ways to cure different diseases.
医生们努力寻找治愈不同疾病的方法。
I will stay at my grandparents' house during the winter holiday.
寒假期间我将待在祖父母家。
We watched a trailer of the new movie before it started.
电影开始前我们看了新电影的预告片。
Please help me pull this heavy box to the corner of the room.
请帮我把这个重箱子拉到房间的角落。
The classroom is bright and clean with many windows.
教室有很多窗户，明亮又干净。
I cannot refuse to help my friend when he is in trouble.
当我的朋友遇到困难时，我不能拒绝帮助他。
If you study hard, you will get a good result in the exam.
如果你努力学习，你会在考试中取得好结果。
What's the matter? You look worried today.
怎么了？你今天看起来忧心忡忡。
Knowledge gives us the power to change the world.
知识给予我们改变世界的力量。
It is unusual for him to be late because he is always on time.
他迟到很不寻常，因为他总是准时。
My dream is to go to a good university after high school.
我的梦想是高中毕业后去一所好大学。
My father will treat us to dinner to celebrate my good marks.
我爸爸要请我们吃饭来庆祝我的好成绩。
I realise that time is very important, so I won't waste it.
我意识到时间非常重要，所以我不会浪费它。
We usually make dumplings together on Chinese New Year's Eve.
我们通常在除夕夜一起包饺子。
It took me the whole afternoon to finish my science project.
我花了整整一个下午来完成我的科学项目。
I like to eat cucumber in my salad because it is fresh and cool.
我喜欢在沙拉里吃黄瓜，因为它新鲜凉爽。
We hang our coats on the hooks behind the classroom door.
我们把外套挂在教室门后的挂钩上。
The children were happy to see many colourful balloons at the party.
孩子们很高兴在聚会上看到许多彩色气球。
We light beautiful red lanterns during the Lantern Festival.
我们在元宵节期间点亮美丽的红灯笼。
My mother cooks a delicious dish of fish for us every week.
我妈妈每周都为我们做一道美味的鱼菜。
He told a funny joke that made everyone in the class laugh.
他讲了一个有趣的笑话，让班上每个人都笑了。
It is against the law to drive a car without a licence.
无证驾驶是违法的。
We were all shocked by the news of the earthquake.
我们都对地震的消息感到震惊。
The funny story made the students laugh happily.
这个有趣的故事让学生们开心地笑了。
My favourite dumplings are filled with pork and cabbage.
我最喜欢的饺子是猪肉白菜馅的。
The moon looks very round and bright on Mid-Autumn Festival.
中秋节时月亮看起来又圆又亮。
The cookies are in the shape of stars and animals.
饼干是星星和动物的形状。
The Spring Festival is a time for family reunion in China.
在中国，春节是家庭团聚的时刻。
Would you like a piece of cake? I made it myself.
你想要一块蛋糕吗？我自己做的。
Use the knife carefully to cut the apple into small pieces.
小心用刀把苹果切成小块。
I love the smell of flowers in the school garden in spring.
我喜欢春天学校花园里花的香味。
Please fill the bottle with water before we start the experiment.
我们开始实验前，请把瓶子装满水。
We put a Christmas tree in our living room in December.
我们在十二月把圣诞树放在客厅里。
Don't waste food. Remember many people in the world are hungry.
不要浪费食物。记住世界上很多人还在挨饿。
You should throw away the rubbish in the correct bin.
你应该把垃圾扔进正确的垃圾桶。
Air pollution is a serious problem in many big cities.
空气污染是许多大城市的一个严重问题。
We should use less plastic bags to protect the environment.
我们应该少用塑料袋来保护环境。
We will celebrate Children's Day with a big party at school.
我们将在学校举行一个大型聚会来庆祝儿童节。
My family usually has a meal together in the evening.
我的家人通常在晚上一起吃饭。
It is our duty to keep our classroom clean and tidy.
保持教室干净整洁是我们的责任。
The sun shines brightly through the window in the morning.
早晨阳光透过窗户明亮地照耀着。
I usually go to the school library to read books on Friday afternoon.
我通常周五下午去学校图书馆看书。
We have a short break between two classes.
我们两节课之间有一个短暂的休息。
The school teaches us what to do in an emergency like a fire.
学校教我们在火灾等紧急情况下该怎么做。
I miss my primary school teachers and friends very much.
我非常想念我的小学老师和朋友们。
After playing football, I feel very thirsty and need some water.
踢完足球后，我感到非常口渴，需要喝点水。
Learning a new language is a big but interesting challenge.
学习一门新语言是一个大但有趣的挑战。
A good teacher is always patient with students' questions.
一位好老师对学生的提问总是很耐心。
In a dangerous situation, we should stay calm and ask for help.
在危险情况下，我们应该保持冷静并寻求帮助。
If you don't study hard now, you will regret it in the future.
如果你现在不努力学习，将来你会后悔的。
My parents support my decision to join the music club.
我的父母支持我加入音乐俱乐部的决定。
My friends always support me when I have difficulties.
当我有困难时，我的朋友们总是支持我。
He wants to be a medical worker to help sick people when he grows up.
他长大后想成为一名医务工作者来帮助生病的人。
We watched beautiful fireworks in the sky on New Year's Eve.
我们在除夕夜观看了天空中美丽的烟花。
Please return the book to the library within two weeks.
请两周内把书还给图书馆。
A quarter of the students in our class like playing basketball.
我们班四分之一的学生喜欢打篮球。
We will have a science workshop to learn about robots next week.
下周我们将有一个科学工作坊来学习机器人。
In autumn, the leaf on the tree turns yellow and falls down.
秋天，树上的叶子变黄并落下。
Each student in our class planted a small tree in the school garden.
我们班的每个学生在学校花园里种了一棵小树。
My hobby is to collect different kinds of stones.
我的爱好是收集不同种类的石头。
The roots of the tree go deep into the ground to get water.
树的根深入地下以获取水分。
I will send a postcard to my pen pal in Canada.
我将给我在加拿大的笔友寄一张明信片。
The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
太阳从东方升起，从西方落下。
Water travels from the roots up the stem to the leaves.
水从根部通过茎向上输送到叶子。
We mix flour, water and eggs to make noodles.
我们把面粉、水和鸡蛋混合起来做面条。
Trees produce oxygen that is very important for us to breathe.
树木产生氧气，这对我们呼吸非常重要。
Eating too much sugar is not good for our teeth.
吃太多糖对我们的牙齿不好。
Milk is a daily product that is good for our health.
牛奶是一种对我们的健康有益的日常产品。
We breathe in oxygen from the air and breathe out carbon dioxide.
我们从空气中吸入氧气，呼出二氧化碳。
Clean water and air are important for all human beings.
干净的水和空气对所有人类都很重要。

虽然这道数学题很难，但我最终解决了它。

当你长时间跑得很快时，很难呼吸。

期末考试后暑假很快就会到来。
It gets dark early in winter, so we go home before six o'clock.
冬天天黑得早，所以我们六点前回家。

走了很长一段路后，我们坐在一棵树下休息。

在公众面前讲话前感到紧张是自然的。

我们在学校花园里种了一些向日葵种子。

植物需要阳光和水才能生长得好。
Reading is an important part of my daily life.
阅读是我日常生活的一个重要部分。
Rainforests are home to many different animals and plants.
雨林是许多不同动植物的家园。
We learn about different cultures in our geography and history classes.
我们在地理和历史课上学习不同的文化。

玉米须是玉米顶部柔软、线状的部分。
Eating vegetables and fruits is good for our health.
吃蔬菜和水果对我们的健康有益。

我妈妈非常喜欢红玫瑰，所以我给她买了一些。

夏天，我喜欢穿棉质衣服，因为它们很凉爽。

熊猫在森林里主要吃竹子。
Basketball is a very popular sport among students in our school.
篮球在我们学校学生中是一项非常受欢迎的运动。
The key to learning English well is to practice every day.
学好英语的关键是每天练习。
My father reads the news in the newspaper every morning.
我爸爸每天早晨读报纸上的新闻。
I prefer tea to coffee because tea is more healthy.
比起咖啡，我更喜欢茶，因为茶更健康。
My parents drink a cup of coffee after breakfast every day.
我父母每天早饭后喝一杯咖啡。

你能保守秘密吗？我有重要的事要告诉你。
Her husband is a doctor who works in a big hospital.
她的丈夫是一位在一家大医院工作的医生。
When you become an adult, you will have more responsibilities.
当你成年时，你将有更多的责任。
I often go to the park with my family at the weekend.
我经常在周末和家人一起去公园。
I like to chat with my friends online after finishing homework.
我喜欢完成作业后在网上和朋友聊天。
Listening to light music helps me relax after a busy day at school.
听轻音乐能帮助我在学校忙碌一天后放松。
We have a small yard in front of our house with some flowers.
我们房子前有一个带些花的小院子。
My grandmother makes delicious biscuits for us when we visit her.
我们去看望祖母时，她为我们做美味的饼干。
The Internet helps us connect with people all over the world.
互联网帮助我们与全世界的人联系。
We can see many pigeons flying in the square in the city centre.
我们可以看到许多鸽子在市中心的广场上飞翔。

我的同学们上周为我准备了一个生日惊喜。

那个旧足球在教室里放了几个月了。

我们应该清理阳台上的鸽子粪便。

我认为这部电影很无聊，因为没有发生什么激动人心的事。

我们每天用特殊的食物喂池塘里的鱼。

那个关于鬼的故事对小孩来说太吓人了。

学生们全靠自己打扫了教室。

她上学前照镜子看看自己。
The cat can open the door by itself because it is very clever.
那只猫自己能开门，因为它很聪明。

也许我们下课后可以一起去图书馆。

这学期我们班有几个新学生。

我家离学校大约两公里远。

如果你在新地方迷路了，应该向警察求助。

在这条繁忙的路上，汽车的速度太高了。

学校聚会上的魔术表演真是太神奇了。

我们有足够的时间完成所有作业吗？

海狸是一种能在河里筑坝的动物。
The wolf in the story was clever but not kind.
故事里的狼很聪明但不善良。

我叔叔是设计桥梁的工程师。
The firefighter is a hero because he saves people from fires.
消防员是英雄，因为他从火灾中救人。

医生努力工作以救治病人。

地震对建筑物造成了很大破坏。

警察正在公园里寻找失踪的孩子。

我们应该节约用水，不用水时关掉水龙头。

晚秋时，地上的叶子是枯死和褐色的。
The dodo is a kind of bird that died out long ago.
渡渡鸟是一种很久以前就灭绝的鸟。

这个旧的电脑游戏完全过时了；现在没人玩了。
The main character in the book is a brave young girl.
书中的主要角色是一个勇敢的小女孩。

我们下周五学校旅行将参观科学博物馆。

他们在南方一个美丽的海岛上度过了假期。
The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean in the world.
太平洋是世界上最大的海洋。
There is plenty of food at the party, so please enjoy it.
聚会上有充足的食物，所以请享用。
The new student is very friendly to everyone in our class.
新同学对我们班的每个人都很友好。
The village is a peaceful place far from the noisy city.
那个村庄是一个远离喧嚣城市的宁静之地。

校车每天早上七点四十分到达我们学校。

许多野生动物生活在森林深处。

我们在学校运动会上玩得非常开心。

收到生日礼物后，小女孩开心极了。
